ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: My guild has one high level bard (me), one mid 30 s bard, and about 6 bard twinks(all under 30).  The Alliance we are a part of has about a dozen planes level
ygData.messageBody:
My guild has one high level bard (me), one mid 30's bard, and about 6 bard
twinks(all under 30). The Alliance we are a part of has about a dozen
planes level bards. Not sure how many below that.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Stephane Lange [mailto:slange@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 7:41 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
>
>
>
> he he we are 6 bards over 30 in our guild on 40 people
> but i guess we are not representative, we are problably the guild with
> the greatest ratio "bard other classes" :)
>
>
> -----Message d'origine-----
> De : Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Envoye : jeudi 12 octobre 2000 14:06
> A : 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Objet : [eqbards] bards in guilds...
>
>
> Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in
> your guilds?
>
> The more i play, the less bards i realize there are. When i
> do a /who all
> bard in my guild, i count 2 bards at the most, me and a lev 52 (unless
> there's a hidden one somewhere). How sad is that? do a /who
> all warrior or
> any other class in the guild and you'll see on average 7.
> Mind you in a
> weird way this is to my advantage as whenever i'm planes
> capable, i wont
> have to lotto for imbrued since she's got a full set, a
> breath of harmony
> and a partisan. But still, i still wish there were more
> bards around but i
> think the numbers will keep dropping as i read this mailing list 8(
>
> P.S. got my ss helm, in a weird way, im kinda happy the
> effect doesnt work
> for me yet. I cant wait to see myself in imbrued/ss together,
> i think the
> green and yellow look cool together.
>
> "you have slain an Eye of Minkin" *sigh*
>
> Minkin
> Valorium
> Sol Ro
>
